title: 1971–72 Midland Football Combination
text:
The 1971–72 Midland Football Combination season was the 35th in the history of <a href="Midland%20Football%20Combination">Midland Football Combination</a>, a <a href="association%20football">football</a> competition in England.
Division One.
Division One featured 17 clubs which competed in the division last season along with one new club:
